featured.text: And in 1994, Microsoft CEO (chief executive officer) Bill Gates paid $30.8 million for a handwritten notebook penned by Leonardo da Vinci.
In this movie, Leonardo DiCaprio played both King Louis XIV and his twin brother Philippe.

definition.zh_def: 列奧納多，意指意大利文藝復興時期的藝術家和科學家，最著名的作品包括《蒙娜麗莎》和《最後的晚餐》。
definition.en_def: Leonardo refers to Leonardo da Vinci, an Italian Renaissance artist and scientist known for masterpieces like the 'Mona Lisa' and 'The Last Supper.'
definition.example: Leonardo da Vinci was a true polymath, excelling in both art and science.
